thread.title: Rare Pics Of Shah Rukh Khan, From The Sets Of Fauji, Are The Perfect Tuesday Throwback
thread.title_full: Rare Pics Of Shah Rukh Khan, From The Sets Of Fauji, Are The Perfect Tuesday Throwback

title: Rare Pics Of Shah Rukh Khan, From The Sets Of Fauji, Are The Perfect Tuesday Throwback
text:
facebook 
Before ruling the big screen, Shah Rukh Khan made a big mark on the small screen. His television hits include Circus (which is making a comeback on T.V.), and Fauji , which was one of his most popular shows. We recently came across a few pictures of the actor from the T.V. sets of Fauji , and it just made us realise one thing - he was always meant to woo the audience. 
Here's a walk down memory lane with Lieutenant Abhimanyu Rai aka SRK. Picture Credits: Twitter
